title: Hillary Clinton: ‘We Didn’t Lose a Single Person’ in Libya
subtitle: Hillary Clinton's assertion that "we didn't lose a single person in Libya" appeared to overlook victims of the Benghazi attacks, but it was taken out of context.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hillary Clinton overlooked Benghazi victims when she said that "we didn't lose a single person in Libya" during a campaign event on MSNBC.
